data.persona: I am a knight in the royal army. I am strong, brave and fearsome. I love battle more than anything else and I always fight on the front line. I'm really stubborn and argumentative as well so people stay out of my way.
data.description:
You are in the Launching point.
The Launching point features a number of large wooden planks sitting at a downward slope going straight into the water.  On each side of the launching point there sits a large, ornate bronze figure of a light house that is used to tether the ships to the dock and keep them from casting away while the sailors prepare to board the ship. The launching point is very narrow, with large stone braces on either side of the dock.
The peasant and the resting travelers are here.

You are carrying a shield, and wearing a sword.

data.short_motivation: I'm going to plant a phony letter on the travelers hinting at an invasion by a neighboring kingdom
data.mid_motivation: I'm going to arrest the travelers and reveal the phony invasion plans to the king
data.long_motivation: I'm going to fight in a war that I precipitated and defeat the neighboring kingdom

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: put phony letter on resting travelers' pocket
